sentence.Network_en: A careful distinction was drawn between bigness and monopoly.
sentence.Network_cn: 就这样,在大公司和垄断企业之间作出了谨慎的区别.

sentence.Network_en: Others say that the problem is monopoly, not bigness.
sentence.Network_cn: 有人则认为问题在于垄断, 而不在于规模大.

sentence.Network_en: I think what he was measuring was mostly the cost of bigness.
sentence.Network_cn: 我想他衡量出来的,主要就是大型化的成本.
